DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct Europe . The aim trial investigate influence oral semaglutide ( NNC0113-0217 ) pharmacokinetics lisinopril warfarin healthy subject .
DOC.brief_title: A Trial Investigating Influence Oral Semaglutide Pharmacokinetics Lisinopril Warfarin Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Male female age 1875 year ( inclusive ) time sign informed consent Body mass index 20.029.9 kg/m^2 ( inclusive ) A good general health base medical history , physical examination , result vital sign , electrocardiogram laboratory safety test perform screen visit , judge investigator Female pregnant , breastfeed intend become pregnant childbearing potential use adequate contraceptive method .
